testcase.name: 1. Search for a product and add to cart
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the greenkart application...............................passed When user searches for "Tom" and adds to cart...............................passed Then user checks product with name "Tom" added to the cart..................passed

testcase.name: 2. Checkout products added to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the greenkart application...............................passed When user searches for "Tom" and adds to cart...............................passed Then user checks product with name "Tom" added to the cart..................passed When user checksout the products added to cart..............................passed Then user verifies the product name from order page.........................passed

testcase.name: 3. Order the products from checkout page
testcase.system-out: Given user launches the greenkart application...............................passed When user searches for "Tom" and adds to cart...............................passed Then user checks product with name "Tom" added to the cart..................passed When user checksout the products added to cart..............................passed Then user verifies the product name from order page.........................passed When user places the order..................................................passed And user selects the country "India"........................................passed Then user accepts the agreement.............................................passed And user proceeds with the order............................................passed Then user recieves "your order has been placed successfully" message........passed
